description: This table stores information about patient treatment teams such as relationship, specialty, department, and start/end time. Each row represents a member of a patient's treatment team.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: TR_TEAM_BILL_PR_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the billing provider record.

columns.name: TR_TEAM_EM_CODE_ID
columns.description: The evaluation and management code for billing within the treatment team.

columns.name: TR_TEAM_EM_REQ_C_NAME
columns.description:
Used to determine if the evaluation and management code is required or not for use in the treatment team.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Required


Not Applicable

columns.name: TR_TEAM_SPEC_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value corresponding to the specialty of the treatment team member to the patient.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: TR_TEAM_COMMENT
columns.description: The comment for the treatment team.

columns.name: TR_TEAM_ISDE_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether or not this provider was deleted.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: TR_TEAM_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the treatment team provider record.

columns.name: TR_TEAM_REL_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value corresponding to the relationship of the treatment team member to the patient.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: TR_TEAM_COMM_C_NAME
columns.description:
Relates to communication being sent to the treatment team members.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No


Sent

columns.name: TR_TEAM_INFO_C_NAME
columns.description:
Additional information related to the treatment team members.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: TR_TEAM_BEG_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time the treatment team member started for the patient.

columns.name: TR_TEAM_END_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time the treatment team member ended for the patient.

columns.name: TR_TEAM_ED_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether or not this provider was on the treatment team in the ED.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: TR_TEAM_ISDE_YN

columns.name: TR_TEAM_TEAM_ADD_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the assignment was added by the team.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: TR_TEAM_ISDE_YN

columns.name: TR_TEAM_SRC_CSN_ID
columns.description: This item stores the contact serial number corresponding to the encounter responsible for assigning a specific member of the treatment team. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).
